summary: Senior banking and wealth-management executive with proven ability to lead large teams, deliver personalized financial strategies across banking, borrowing and investments for affluent clients, and drive growth of client assets. Strong presenter and relationship-builder with capabilities in sales leadership, client relations, and end-to-end service delivery.

experience.title: SVP, Regional Sales Director Wealth Management
experience.description: Responsible for managing a team of 24 relationship managers delivering personalized financial strategies for affluent clients across banking, borrowing, and investments; grew client assets; single point of contact for all banking needs; holistic delivery of service and sales solutions.

experience.title: SVP, Group Leader
experience.description: Managed Citizens Bank's Business Banking Contact Center in RI and PA; short-term project to enhance client experience and create efficiencies in Phonebank related sales; Total FTE responsible: 210.

experience.title: SVP, Regional Manager-Business Banking Group
experience.description: Manage a team of 21 Business Banking Officers in Boston Downtown Region; Member of Citizens Management advisory council.

experience.title: Department Head, Men's Wear
experience.description: Managed a sales staff of 15; established follow-up program; expanded Dockers Men's Wear business from $2M to $3M while maintaining gross margin >50%; analyzed needs and implemented cost-effective programs.
